name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Europeana
description: This is a repository of europeana APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Europeana
apis.description: Explore 51,990,182 artworks, artefacts, books, videos and sounds from more than 3,500 museums, galleries, libraries and archives across Europe.
